trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_SEQ_00<tab>Jayanti seems to have reservations about her next outing.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_TODO_00<tab>Use the flat ale at the designated location and slay the Gyr Abanian mud slugs.

TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_000<tab>Ah, adventurer. We were jussst preparing to go hunting. It is a duty in which we take great pride, but I fear the risssk to my sisters only grows in recent daysss.

TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_001<tab>Our greatest weapon is the poison-tipped arrow. All beasts succumb to its effects quite quickly. All sssave for one─the Gyr Abanian mud ssslug. Their numbers have increasssed of late, which makes hunting all the more difficult.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_002<tab>Their resistance to our poisonsss leaves us with no choice but to fight in close quartersss, and therein liesss the problem.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_100_003<tab>They attack by ssspitting. It appearsss ineffectual against most creaturesss, but is highly corrosive to our ssskin.

TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_003<tab>The Lady of Blisss would surely be cross if we marred the beautiful ssskin she's blessed us with. That is why I would ask you to thin their numbers in our ssstead.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_004<tab>Take thisss bottle of flat ale. Ssscatter it about the grounds north of here, and ssslay any slugs that are drawn by the sssmell.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_005<tab>When the ssslugs come, be careful of their ssspit. I don't know what effect it will have on ssstriders.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_010<tab>You've returned, and no worssse for wear. We are lucky to have made friends with one so capable.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_011<tab>Tell me, did you also find the ssslugs to be repulsssive?
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_012<tab>Their ssslimy backs and unsssightly squirming. I can think of no creature more hideousss than the ssslug.
TEXT_STMBDZ715_02818_JAYANTI_000_013<tab>Yet you seem unaffected both by their sssaliva and their grotesque visssage. If they pose a threat to usss again, I will be sssure to call you.
